item.title: Salesforce shares can rally more than 30% thanks to latest AI push, Bank of America says
item.description: Salesforce shares have more upside in store as the software giant rolls out its latest AI plans, according to Bank of America.

item.title: Airline executives set to defend seat fees before Senate panel
item.description: Executives from American, United, Delta, Frontier and Spirit are set to testify before a Senate panel Wednesday about their seating fees.

item.title: Contentious budget plans are wreaking political havoc across Europe
item.description: Post-pandemic fiscal rules are putting pressure on even the most hawkish EU members in the euro zone.
